TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit Visual extends System.Windows.DependencyObject
Public MustInherit Class Visual Inherits DependencyObject
public ref class Visual abstract : System::Windows::DependencyObject
type Visual = class inherit DependencyObject interface DUCE.IResource

summary.span: 为 WPF 中的呈现提供支持，其中包括命中测试、坐标转换和边界框计算。

span.span: Provides rendering support in WPF, which includes hit testing, coordinate transformation, and bounding box calculations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是从其的基本抽象每个对象派生。The class is the basic abstraction from which every object derives. 它还可以作为编写新控件的入口点[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]，并在很多方面可以认为的窗口句柄 (HWND) 的等效中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)]应用程序模型。It also serves as the entry point for writing new controls in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], and in many ways can be thought of as an equivalent of a window handle (HWND) in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] application model. 对象是一项核心[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]对象，它的主要角色是提供呈现支持。The object is a core [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] object, whose primary role is to provide rendering support. 用户界面控件，如并，派生自类，并使用定义的属性来保持其呈现数据。User interface controls, such as and , derive from the class, and use the defined properties for persisting their rendering data. 对象提供以下支持：The object provides support for the following: - 输出显示：呈现视觉对象的持久、序列化的绘图内容。Output display: Rendering the persisted, serialized drawing content of a visual. - 转换：针对视觉对象执行转换。Transformations: Performing transformations on a visual. - 剪裁：为视觉对象提供剪裁区域支持。Clipping: Providing clipping region support for a visual. - 命中测试： 确定是否在视觉对象的边界内包含指定的坐标 （点） 或几何形状。Hit testing: Determining whether a specified coordinate (point) or geometry is contained within the bounds of a visual. - 边框计算：确定视觉对象的边框。Bounding box calculations: Determining the bounding rectangle of a visual. 体系结构方面，对象不包含对其他应用程序开发要求支持 /[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]密切相关的其呈现，如下所示的功能：Architecturally, the object does not include support for other application development requirements / [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] features that are not immediately related to its rendering, such as the following: - 事件处理Event handling - 布局Layout - 样式Styles - 数据绑定Data binding - 全球化Globalization 作为从其进一步类可以派生的公共抽象类提供。 is provided as a public abstract class from which further classes can be derived. 下图显示了现有视觉对象中定义的层次结构[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]体系结构。The following illustration shows the hierarchy of the existing visual objects that are defined in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] architecture. ![从 Visual 对象派生的类关系图](~/add/media/visualclass01.png "从 Visual 对象派生的类关系图")![Diagram of classes derived from the Visual object](~/add/media/visualclass01.png "Diagram of classes derived from the Visual object") 视觉对象类层次结构Visual class hierarchy 在某些情况下，成员定义为在受保护作为具有类似名称中派生更易于访问的成员公开类。In some cases, members that are defined as protected in are exposed as more readily accessible members with similar names in the derived class. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [WPF 图形呈现概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/wpf-graphics-rendering-overview.md)。For more information, see [WPF Graphics Rendering Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/wpf-graphics-rendering-overview.md). 一个具有有限的数量的级别。A has a limited number of levels. 在以前版本的.NET Framework，此最大深度是 255。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this maximum depth was 255. 此限制不足以包含可视化树中的多级别，某些布局支持。This limit is inadequate for some layouts that have many levels in the visual tree. 在中[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]的最大深度为 2047，从而使更深层的可视化树。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], the maximum depth of a is 2047, which enables much deeper visual trees. 在大多数应用程序中没有足够的堆栈空间来遍历如此多的级别，并且结果是在布局过程。In most applications, there is not enough stack space to traverse so many levels, and the result is a during layout. 对于默认堆栈大小，将引发此异常通常时的树深度为大约 800，它对应于大约 190 个嵌套对象。For the default stack size, this exception is usually thrown when the tree depth is approximately 800, which corresponds to about 190 nested objects. 如果您的应用程序引发此异常，并且你需要更深入的可视化树，则可以增加应用程序的堆栈大小。If this exception is thrown by your application and you need to have a deeper visual tree, you can increase the application's stack size. 通过使用在编译时 /STACK 选项或使用 EDITBIN 实用工具，可以增加堆栈大小。You can increase the size of the stack by using the /STACK option at compile time or by using the EDITBIN utility. 增加堆栈大小可能会影响应用程序的性能。Increasing the stack size may affect your application's performance. 有关详细信息，请参阅[堆栈分配](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=165510)并[EDITBIN 选项](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=165511)。For more information, see [Stack Allocations](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=165510) and [EDITBIN Options](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=165511).

span.span: The child visual object to add to parent visual.

summary.span: 定义两个可视对象之间的父子关系。

span.span: Defines the parent-child relationship between two visuals.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法设置两个可视对象之间的父-子关系。The method sets up the parent-child relationship between two visual objects. 在需要更好地可视子对象的基础存储实现的低级别控制时，必须使用此方法。This method must be used when you need greater low-level control over the underlying storage implementation of visual child objects. 可以用于存储子对象使用作为默认实现。 can be used as a default implementation for storing child objects. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何定义一个可视化子级的自定义存储要求。The following example shows how to define custom storage requirements for a visual child. 该示例使用并还设置了父可视对象之间的父-子关系的方法和`child`。The example uses the and methods to sets up the parent-child relationship between the parent visual and `child`. 为了使可视化树，以正确枚举，该示例提供的重写的实现方法和属性。In order for the visual tree to be enumerated correctly, the example provides overridden implementations of the method and property. > [!NOTE] > 尽管可以使用但若要创建父-子可视对象之间的关系，是只有一个子链接至父项时，提供您自己的自定义存储实现更高效。Although it is possible to use to create parent-child relationships between visual objects, it is more efficient to provide your own custom storage implementation when only one child is linked to a parent. [!code-csharp[AddVisualChild#AddVisualChild01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/AddVisualChild/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#addvisualchild01)] [!code-vb[AddVisualChild#AddVisualChild01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/AddVisualChild/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#addvisualchild01)]

param.name: hitTestParameters
param.span: 对象，指定 针对命中测试。

span.span: A object that specifies the to hit test against.

summary.span: 确定可视对象的边界中是否存在几何图形值。

span.span: Determines whether a geometry value is within the bounds of the visual object.

returns.span: 表示命中测试结果的 对象。

span.span: A that represents the result of the hit test.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以重写默认命中测试支持的视觉对象通过重写方法。You can override default hit testing support for a visual object by overriding the method. 这意味着，当您调用方法中，您重写的实现调用。This means that when you invoke the method, your overridden implementation of is called. 重写的方法被调用命中的测试落在视觉对象的边框内时，即使坐标落之外的视觉对象的几何图形。Your overridden method is called when a hit test falls within the bounding rectangle of the visual object, even if the coordinate falls outside the geometry of the visual object. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何重写 方法。The following example shows how to override the method. 你可能想要重写此方法的原因之一是在命中测试过程中提供其他功能。One reason you might want to override this method is to provide additional functionality during the hit testing process. [!code-csharp[HitTestingOverview#HitTestingOverviewSnippet13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTestingOverview/CSharp/GeometryHitTest.cs#hittestingoverviewsnippet13)] [!code-vb[HitTestingOverview#HitTestingOverviewSnippet13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTestingOverview/visualbasic/geometryhittest.vb#hittestingoverviewsnippet13)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从派生的类可以选择重写此方法。A class that derives from can choose to override this method. 没有"没有"的事件实例将报告此更改。There is no "VisualParentChanged" event provided that reports this change to instances. 因此，必须重写此方法以处理通知方案，如果你的方案的一部分提供的实例版本的通知。Therefore, you must override this method to handle notification scenarios and provide an instance version of the notification if that is part of your scenario. ## Examples 下面的示例定义的重写的实现。The following example defines an overridden implementation of . remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将删除两个视觉对象之间的父-子关系。The method removes the parent-child relationship between two visuals. 此方法，以及方法，必须使用时需要更好地可视子对象的基础存储实现的低级别控制。This method, along with the method, must be used when you need greater low-level control over the underlying storage implementation of visual child objects. 可以用于存储子对象使用作为默认实现。 can be used as a default implementation for storing child objects. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何定义一个可视化子级的自定义存储要求。The following example shows how to define custom storage requirements for a visual child. 该示例使用并还设置了父可视对象之间的父-子关系的方法和`child`。The example uses the and methods to sets up the parent-child relationship between the parent visual and `child`. 为了使可视化树，以正确枚举，该示例提供的重写的实现方法和属性。In order for the visual tree to be enumerated correctly, the example provides overridden implementations of the method and property. > [!NOTE] > 尽管可以使用但若要创建父-子可视对象之间的关系，是只有一个子链接至父项时，提供您自己的自定义存储实现更高效。Although it is possible to use to create parent-child relationships between visual objects, it is more efficient to provide your own custom storage implementation when only one child is linked to a parent. [!code-csharp[AddVisualChild#AddVisualChild01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/AddVisualChild/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#addvisualchild01)] [!code-vb[AddVisualChild#AddVisualChild01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/AddVisualChild/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#addvisualchild01)]

[!code-csharp[VisualSnippets#VisualSnippet5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/VisualSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#visualsnippet5)] [!code-vb[VisualSnippets#VisualSnippet5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/VisualSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#visualsnippet5)] 偏移量会考虑值中包含的所有对象。The offset takes into account the values for all objects within the containing . 在这种情况下，为 28，和为 28。In this case, is 28, and is 28.

summary.span: 获取或设置 的不透明度。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不透明度值表示为介于 0 和 1 之间的值。The value of the opacity of the is expressed as a value between 0 and 1. 值为 0 指示该元素是完全透明，而值为 1 指示该元素是完全不透明。A value of 0 indicates that the element is completely transparent, whereas a value of 1 indicates that the element is completely opaque. 值 0.5 表示该元素为 50%不透明。A value of 0.5 indicates that the element is 50 percent opaque. 小于 0 的值将被视为 0;大于 1 的值将被视为 1。Values that are less than 0 are treated as 0; values that are greater than 1 are treated as 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性，以便启用加速软件中呈现时滚动。Set the property to enable accelerated scrolling when rendering in software. 这可在远程呈现的情况下，例如，运行通过远程桌面或虚拟机中运行。This is useful in remote rendering scenarios, such as running over Remote Desktop or running in a virtual machine. 将滚动的子级的父元素上设置此属性。Set this property on the parent element whose children will be scrolled. 设置属性不起作用时呈现了硬件加速。Setting the property has no effect when rendering is hardware accelerated. 属性可实现特定的高级方案。The property enables specific, advanced scenarios. 以下列表显示了需要注意的问题，当你使用属性。The following list shows the caveats that apply when you use the property. - 滚动区域背景的必须是不透明的或者会发生滚动项目。The background of the scrolled area must be opaque, or scrolling artifacts will occur. - 属性加速滚动仅 WPF 呈现在软件中。The property accelerates scrolling only when WPF is rendering in software. 例如，通过远程桌面运行或在虚拟机中本地运行应用程序时，将出现这种情况。For example, this situation occurs when the application is running over Remote Desktop or running locally in a virtual machine. - 在硬件中呈现时保持不变的滚动行为。The scrolling behavior is unchanged when rendering in hardware. 若要防止滚动行为的差异，应该保留属性启用了硬件和软件。To prevent differences in scrolling behavior, you should keep the property enabled for both hardware and software. - 旋转和扭曲变换禁用加速滚动。Rotate and skew transforms disable accelerated scrolling. 缩放转换和上方的滚动区域的水平或垂直翻译正常工作，并且不会禁用滚动加速。Scale transforms and horizontal or vertical translations above the scrolled region work correctly and do not disable scrolling acceleration. - 更改子树或触发的可滚动区域重绘动画通过部分行为符合预期，但会丢失重绘的区域的加速滚动的优势。Changing the subtree or triggering parts of the scrollable area to redraw via animation behave as expected, but lose the benefit of accelerated scrolling for the redrawn area. 任何动画，使滚动的区域无效，在相同的帧期间发生的滚动消除了这种优化的权益。Any animation that invalidates the scrolled area during the same frame in which scrolling occurs eliminates the benefit of this optimization. - 矩形向内对齐到像素为单位。The rectangle snaps inward to pixels. 因此，滚动矩形的对齐的大小是始终小于或等于您设置的大小。Therefore, the snapped size of the scrolling rectangle is always less than or equal to the size you have set. - 向下对齐的偏移量。Offsets snap downward. 这意味着的上一个差异对齐偏移量和当前对齐的偏移量始终为整数的像素为单位。This means that the difference of the previous snapped offset and current snapped offset is always an integer number of pixels. - 命中的测试可能相差多达一个像素。Hit tests can be off by up to a pixel. - 布局舍入应打开，因为它可确保可滚动区域和边界窗口工作区的边缘会对齐到像素边界，从而导致正确对齐方式。Layout rounding should be turned on, because it ensures that the edges of scrollable areas and the boundary window client area are snapped to pixel boundaries, resulting in correct alignment. - 滚动加速不起作用分层窗口。Scrolling acceleration does not work on layered windows. 这意味着 windows 中哪些 AllowTransparency = = true，window.windowstyle = = none，依次类推。This means windows in which AllowTransparency == true, window.windowstyle == none, and so on. - 滚动加速不会发生在全窗口呈现过程。Scrolling acceleration does not occur during full-window rendering. - 滚动加速不会正常工作时窗口跨两个监视器。Scrolling acceleration does not work when the window straddles two monitors. - 出现滚动元素的父链中的中间呈现器目标的情况下，滚动加速不会正常工作。Scrolling acceleration does not work in the presence of intermediate render targets in the parent chain of the scrolled element. 以下列表显示了其中一些中间呈现目标。The following list shows some of these intermediate render targets. - 剪辑Clips - 效果Effects - DrawingBrushesDrawingBrushes - VisualBrushesVisualBrushes - OpacityMasksOpacityMasks - 不透明度Opacity - 每一帧可能会发生一个加速的滚动。Only one accelerated scroll can happen per frame. 可以有多个加速的滚动区域，但仅有一种可以在范围内执行加速的滚动。There can be multiple accelerated scroll areas, but only one of them can perform an accelerated scroll during a frame. 滚动的区域是不确定。Which area is scrolled is indeterminate. - 滚动加速支持以上不滚动内容的其余部分 （在 z 顺序） 的滚动区域的内容。Scrolling acceleration supports content above the scrolling region (in z-order) that is not scrolled with the rest of the content. 在系统计算所有必要的更新区域，并完成加速的滚动，但它无法通过网络移动的无意中滚动的部分其他多个位图后会向发送其正确的位置在屏幕上。The system calculates all necessary dirty regions and completes the accelerated scroll, but it sends several additional bitmaps over the wire to move the unintentionally scrolled portion back to its correct position on screen.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 启用像素对齐功能是，以便对象边缘呈现在特定于设备的像素为单位，内容布局固定的过程。Pixel snapping is the process in which content layout is fixed so that object edges are rendered on device-specific pixels. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 图形系统使用与设备无关的单元来使分辨率和设备独立。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] graphics system uses device-independent units to enable resolution and device independence. 每个与设备无关的像素都会随着系统的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dpi](~/includes/tlasharptla-dpi-md.md)] 设置自动进行缩放。Each device independent pixel automatically scales with the system's [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dpi](~/includes/tlasharptla-dpi-md.md)] setting. 这为 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 应用程序提供了不同 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)] 设置的适当缩放，并使应用程序自动感知 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)]。This provides [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] applications proper scaling for different [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)] settings and makes the application automatically [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)]-aware. 但是，这[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)]独立性可能由于抗锯齿不规则的边缘呈现出。However, this [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)] independence can create irregular edge rendering due to anti-aliasing. 边缘的位置位于中间设备像素，而不是设备像素之间时，可能发生的这些项目，通常被视为模糊或"软"边缘。These artifacts, commonly seen as blurry or "soft" edges, can occur when the location of an edge falls in the middle of a device pixel rather than between device pixels. 若要解决此问题， [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] ""与设备像素对齐，从而排除柔化边缘抗锯齿生成将可视化树中的对象边缘提供一种方法。To address this issue, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] provides a way for object edges in a visual tree to "snap" to device pixels, eliminating the soft edges produced by anti-aliasing.

span.span: The y-coordinate guideline collection of the visual.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 启用像素对齐功能是，以便对象边缘呈现在特定于设备的像素为单位，内容布局固定的过程。Pixel snapping is the process in which content layout is fixed so that object edges are rendered on device-specific pixels. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 图形系统使用与设备无关的单元来使分辨率和设备独立。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] graphics system uses device-independent units to enable resolution and device independence. 每个与设备无关的像素都会随着系统的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dpi](~/includes/tlasharptla-dpi-md.md)] 设置自动进行缩放。Each device independent pixel automatically scales with the system's [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dpi](~/includes/tlasharptla-dpi-md.md)] setting. 这为 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 应用程序提供了不同 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)] 设置的适当缩放，并使应用程序自动感知 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)]。This provides [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] applications proper scaling for different [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)] settings and makes the application automatically [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)]-aware. 但是，这[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)]独立性可能由于抗锯齿不规则的边缘呈现出。However, this [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)] independence can create irregular edge rendering due to anti-aliasing. 边缘的位置位于中间设备像素，而不是设备像素之间时，可能发生的这些项目，通常可看做模糊，或"软"边缘。These artifacts, commonly seen as blurry, or "soft" edges, can occur when the location of an edge falls in the middle of a device pixel rather than between device pixels. 若要解决此问题， [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] ""与设备像素对齐，从而排除柔化边缘抗锯齿生成将可视化树中的对象边缘提供一种方法。To address this issue, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] provides a way for object edges in a visual tree to "snap" to device pixels, eliminating the soft edges produced by anti-aliasing.
